howTo.title: How to Use Blind Cube Trainer
howTo.welcomeText: Welcome! This app is designed to help you practice blindfold solving with the
howTo.edgeBuffer: For edges, the buffer is UR. We handle swaps with UL using a T-perm.
howTo.cornerBuffer: For corners, the buffer is UBL. We handle swaps with BFR.
howTo.validationText: The app validates your blindfold solutions so you can focus on memorization and execution.

orientation.title: Orientation:
orientation.description: Adjust orientation controls if needed (your solution will follow this orientation).

cubes.title: Cubes:
cubes.description: Compare the scramble (left cube) and your solution applied (right cube).
